page.title: 09SOCIAL CONCERN K.FLEETHAM
page.content: IN KIRKBY FLEETHAM VILLAGE AND IN FENCOTE PEOPLE HAVE ALWAYS DONE THEIR BEST TO HELP OTHERS. THIS YEAR THE LOCAL CHILDREN HAVE SUPPORTED MANY CHARITIES WITH THE HELP OF THE CHURCH,SCHOOL AND UNIFORMED ORGANISATIONS.THEY INCLUDE - ETHIOPIAN FAMINE RELIEF ARTHRITIS & RHEUMATISM RESEARCH SAVE THE CHILDREN FUND FREEMAN HEART MACHINE APPEAL FOUNDATION FOR THE STUDY OF COT DEATH ROYAL NATIONAL INSTITUTE FOR BLIND CHURCH OF ENGLAND CHILDREN'S SOCIETY BLUE PETER LEND AN EAR APPEAL SRI LANKAN GUIDES APPEAL KIT-KAT APPEAL (CUBS) BOOKS FOR THE THIRD WORLD
